title: Land for sale at Malabe
details:
Good Residential rectangular flat land in 1st Lane, Amaragoda Road, Pothuarawa, Malabe
Very peaceful and tranquil surrounding.

Land extent – 10 perches
Land facing a 20 feet wide road
Surrounded by parapet walls with a sliding gate
Electricity & Pipe borne water
2 Rooms with a toilet
Clear deeds

100 meters to Pothuarawa Road
1.75 Km to Malabe Town
3.5 Km to Pelawatta Junction
3.5 Km to Athurugiriya highway entrance


Total Price Rs 10 Million

Please call 0773000398, 0766081326 for more information
